name: Weathermatic
0:
”Alexa, tell Weathermatic to water the yard.”
”Alexa, tell Weathermatic to turn off the sprinklers.”
”Alexa, ask Weathermatic to set a rain delay.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weathermatic
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Weathermatic Skill allows you to issue commands to any Smartlink-connected sprinkler controller.  You will need a Smartline/Proline sprinkler controller installed already activated and associated with your Smartlinknetwork.com login.  This Alexa skill will always operate on your "primary" controller, which can be designated from the user profile page on Smartlink Network.  Once connected, you can easily run zones, programs, halt watering, or set a rain delay. Learn more at https://smartlink.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001559108.
